com.google.enterprise.connector.spi

Class SocialCollectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.SocialCollectionHandler

  • public final class SocialCollectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    SocialCollectionHandler initializes a social collection, which is a container in GSA for social documents, like user profile documents. These documents are excluded from default_collection. Specific modules interested in this data can query this collection to retrieve all the data.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean initializeSocialCollection(java.lang.String gsaHost, int gsaPort, java.lang.String gsaAdmin, java.lang.String gsaAdminPassword, java.lang.String collectionName)
      Initialize user profile collection.
      static boolean validateCollectionName(java.lang.String collectionName)
      Validates name of collection to consist of [a-z][A-Z][0-9]-_

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • initializeSocialCollection

        public static boolean initializeSocialCollection(java.lang.String gsaHost,
                                 int gsaPort,
                                 java.lang.String gsaAdmin,
                                 java.lang.String gsaAdminPassword,
                                 java.lang.String collectionName)
        Initialize user profile collection. Every social connector should call this once to ensure GSA is ready to accept user profile data from the connector. If collectionName parameter is null or "" then default collection _google_social_userprofile_collection is used.
        Parameters:
        gsaHost - host address of GSA
        gsaPort - port of GSA for gdata call
        gsaAdmin - userId for making gdata call to GSA
        gsaAdminPassword - password for making gdata call to GSA
        collectionName - name of the collection where user profiles will go.
        Returns:
        true if social collection has been initialized successfully

      • validateCollectionName

        public static boolean validateCollectionName(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Validates name of collection to consist of [a-z][A-Z][0-9]-_
        Parameters:
        collectionName - name of collection
        Returns:
        true if valid
